% ====================================================
% Custom LaTeX Header for AAGI Report Template
% ====================================================

% Define commonly used commands and settings
\newcommand{\HRule}{\rule{\linewidth}{0.5mm}}  % Horizontal rule with custom thickness
\newcommand{\sbf}[1]{\textsf{\textbf{#1}}}  % Custom command for sans-serif bold text

% ---------------------------------------
% Color Definitions
% ---------------------------------------
\usepackage{xcolor}
\definecolor{AAGI}{HTML}{00808b}     % Define primary AAGI color (teal)
\definecolor{AAGIblue}{HTML}{00808b} % Secondary AAGI blue (same as primary)
\definecolor{AAGIgreen}{HTML}{b6d438} % AAGI green color for accents
\definecolor{AAGIblack}{HTML}{414042} % Neutral black for headings and text

% ---------------------------------------
% Font Configuration
% ---------------------------------------
\usepackage{fontspec}
% \setmainfont{Proxima Nova Light}  % Main font for text
% \setsansfont{Proxima Nova}        % Sans-serif font for headings and titles

\IfFileExists{_extensions/aagi-report/fonts/ProximaNova.sty}{
  % Load the ProximaNova.sty package if it exists
  \usepackage{_extensions/aagi-report/fonts/ProximaNova}
}{
  % Fallback to checking if the system font Proxima Nova is installed
  \IfFontExistsTF{Proxima Nova Light}{
    \setmainfont{Proxima Nova Light}
  }{
    % Fallback to Arial if Proxima Nova is not available
    \setmainfont{Arial}
  }

  \IfFontExistsTF{Proxima Nova}{
    \setsansfont{Proxima Nova}
  }{
    % Fallback to Arial if Proxima Nova is not available
    \setsansfont{Arial}
  }
}

% ---------------------------------------
% Hyperlink Configuration
% ---------------------------------------
\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{
    colorlinks=true,      % Enable colored links
    linkcolor=AAGI,       % Set link color to AAGI teal
    urlcolor=AAGI         % Set URL color to AAGI teal
}

% ---------------------------------------
% Graphics and List Formatting
% ---------------------------------------
\usepackage{graphicx}  % Include graphics in the document
\providecommand{\tightlist}{%
  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}}  % Set tight list formatting

% ---------------------------------------
% Conditional Packages
% ---------------------------------------
% Load 'upquote' for verbatim environments with straight quotes (if available)
\IfFileExists{upquote.sty}{\usepackage{upquote}}{}

% Load 'microtype' for better typography (if available)
\IfFileExists{microtype.sty}{%
  \usepackage{microtype}
  \UseMicrotypeSet[protrusion]{basicmath} % Disable protrusion for tt fonts
}{}

% ---------------------------------------
% Appendix Setup
% ---------------------------------------
\newcommand{\aagiappendix}{%
  \appendix  % Start appendix section
  \renewcommand{\thesection}{\Alph{section}}  % Change section numbering to A, B, C, etc.
  \setcounter{section}{0}  % Reset section counter for appendix
}

% ---------------------------------------
% Headers and Footers Setup
% ---------------------------------------
\usepackage{fancyhdr}   % Use fancyhdr for custom headers and footers
\usepackage{sectsty}    % Use sectsty to style section headings
\usepackage{tocloft}    % Use tocloft to customize Table of Contents (TOC)
